translation.en: The P stands for "pussy pounder." [laughs]
translation.vi: Chữ P nghĩa là "dần thịt."

translation.en: It's great to finally meet you.
translation.vi: Thật tuyệt vì cuối cùng cũng gặp các anh.

translation.en: I was starting to think you were never gonna move in.
translation.vi: Tôi suýt nghĩ là các anh chả bao giờ dọn tới.

translation.en: Yeah, the movers were here about a month ago,
translation.vi: Ừ, đội chuyển hàng đã tới từ tháng trước,

translation.en: but they were so hush-hush about who was movin' in here.
translation.vi: nhưng họ khá kín tiếng về những người chủ mới.

translation.en: Like it was the president or George Clooney or somethin'.
translation.vi: Làm như Tổng thống hay George Clooney không chừng.

translation.en: Ah, that's interesting.
translation.vi: Nghe hay đấy.

translation.en: I don't know what the big secret was. It's just us.
translation.vi: Tôi chả biết bí mật lớn gì cả. Chỉ có chúng tôi thôi.

translation.en: -[giggles] -[Max] What do you think?
translation.vi: Cô thấy sao?

translation.en: You want a Corona?

translation.en: I'd tell you to pull up a lounge chair, but we don't got no more.

translation.en: Maybe Dr. Ron'll make you a little room.
translation.vi: Chắc Bác sĩ Ron sẽ nhường ít chỗ cho cô đây.

translation.en: Ooh. Oh, I would love to.
translation.vi: Tôi rất sẵn lòng.

translation.en: But actually, I'm running late for my mani-pedi.
translation.vi: Thực ra, tôi đang trễ buổi làm đẹp của tôi.

translation.en: I gotta get all pretty for tonight. Oh, you two should come with.

translation.en: It's Rum Runner night at Club Oro.

translation.en: -[Max] Lookin' sharp, by the way, big boy. -Really?

translation.en: You don't think this is too Magnum?
translation.vi: Cậu không nghĩ nó hơi đậm chất Magnum à?

translation.en: -You could never go too Magnum. -[chuckles]
translation.vi: Cậu làm gì có cửa tới Magnum.

translation.en: Maybe lose the hat, though.

translation.en: Ooh, hola, neighbors.

translation.en: -Butch, Ronald, this is my co-pilot, Joan. -[Charlie] Ah.

translation.en: Dawn dragged me along to make sure she doesn't do anything to embarrass herself.

translation.en: -Who's watching you, then? -[Dawn laughs]

translation.en: -Oh, you're funny. -[Max] Mmm-hmm.
translation.vi: Anh thật vui tính.

translation.en: Buenas noches. Welcome to Rum Runner night here at Club Oro.

translation.en: I'm Jorge, I'm gonna be your shooter boy for the evening.

translation.en: Jorge, nice to meet you. Who's this crazy fuck over here?

translation.en: Oh, he's, uh, shooter boy-in-training.

translation.en: He's just watching, observing, no need to worry.

translation.en: How can I help you?

translation.en: How about four Panty Droppers?

translation.en: [Jorge] Oh, yeah! Naughty, naughty, naughty!

translation.en: [both] Guilty!

translation.en: Please, I got you both beat. How old are you?

translation.en: -No way! Y'all aren't 55. -[Dawn] Mmm-mmm.

translation.en: You're right, Joan. This guy just had his 57th birthday.

translation.en: Well, I've never been afraid of doing over 55.

translation.en: You tell them your real age, they just shrug. No big deal.

translation.en: Now, you're the fountain of fucking youth.

translation.en: No wonder that chick stalks you. Where did you learn to talk like this?
